meta.title: Coding Round (JavaScript)
meta.instructions: Write JavaScript that defines the required function. The simulator runs test cases in your browser (no server).

tasks.title: Sum of Array
tasks.prompt: Write a function sumArray(arr) that returns the sum of all numbers in arr.

tasks.title: Count Vowels
tasks.prompt: Write a function countVowels(s) that returns the number of vowels (a,e,i,o,u) in the string s.

tasks.title: Two Sum Indexes
tasks.prompt: Write a function twoSum(nums, target) that returns indexes [i, j] such that nums[i] + nums[j] = target. Assume exactly one solution.
hints: Use a map from value -> index.
